post.body: Follow those that add information or value to your life + follow the people YOU like.

I use both wordpress and typepad extensively, I'd be happy to discuss the pros and cons with you.
BTW, I did the menubar inTheHealtyCookingCoach in CSS and Javascript. It re-writes the Banner div.

most people do not recognize The Healthy Cooking Coach as a blog, let alone Typepad.
businessbloggingpros.com is just a website, not a blog. Built it myself using ColdFusion. What part of the footer interests you?
